attributes.action: all nurses, cleaners, and carers working for the NHS get 15 ,% pay increase
attributes.additional_details: We have misused these incredible people for too many years .... Give them the pay they deserve
attributes.background: My petition is that starting immediately all nurses, cleaners, and carers working for the NHS should be given minimum 15 ,% pay increase ... As they are the human backbone that we need to survive
